reviewText: I would try to look for this documentary online or on Netflix or something because although it is interesting and informative, it is mostly older people talking about their childhood, recounting stories and anecdotes which are only amusing to them because they've been there. The audience ends up being a little bored.

We visited Alcatraz recently, and I was so intrigued when I learned that the families of the officers lived on the island. There were many children who grew up there, and the stories that they tell in this DVD were so interesting. I never would have guessed!
